db:select.doc:name: Select Global Parties
db:select.db:sql: SELECT * FROM global_parties WHERE (:globalId::uuid IS NULL OR global_id = :globalId::uuid) AND (:partyType IS NULL OR party_type = :partyType) AND (:lastName IS NULL OR last_name = :lastName) AND (:taxId IS NULL OR tax_id = :taxId) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT :limit::integer OFFSET :offset::integer

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- if (payload is Array) payload else [payload] default []

db:select.doc:name: Select External IDs
db:select.db:sql: SELECT party_global_id, external_system, external_value FROM external_ids WHERE party_global_id = ANY(:partyGlobalIds::uuid[])

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json var parties = vars.parties var externalIds = payload var externalIdsByParty = externalIds groupBy $.party_global_id --- parties map ((party) -> { id: party.id as String, globalId: party.global_id as String, partyType: party.party_type, firstName: party.first_name, lastName: party.last_name, middleName: party.middle_name, organizationName: party.organization_name, dateOfBirth: party.date_of_birth, taxId: party.tax_id, externalIds: (externalIdsByParty[party.global_id as String] default []) map ((ext) -> { system: ext.external_system, value: ext.external_value }), createdAt: party.created_at, updatedAt: party.updated_at })

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- { global_id: payload.globalId default null, party_type: payload.partyType, first_name: payload.firstName default null, last_name: payload.lastName default null, middle_name: payload.middleName default null, organization_name: payload.organizationName default null, date_of_birth: payload.dateOfBirth default null, tax_id: payload.taxId default null }

db:insert.doc:name: Upsert Party
db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO global_parties ( global_id, party_type, first_name, last_name, middle_name, organization_name, date_of_birth, tax_id ) VALUES ( COALESCE(:global_id::uuid, gen_random_uuid()), :party_type, :first_name, :last_name, :middle_name, :organization_name, :date_of_birth::date, :tax_id ) ON CONFLICT (global_id) DO UPDATE SET party_type = EXCLUDED.party_type, first_name = EXCLUDED.first_name, last_name = EXCLUDED.last_name, middle_name = EXCLUDED.middle_name, organization_name = EXCLUDED.organization_name, date_of_birth = EXCLUDED.date_of_birth, tax_id = EXCLUDED.tax_id, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP RETURNING *

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- vars.externalIds map ((ext) -> { party_global_id: vars.globalId, external_system: ext.system, external_value: ext.value })

db:insert.doc:name: Insert External ID
db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO external_ids ( party_global_id, external_system, external_value ) VALUES ( :party_global_id::uuid, :external_system, :external_value ) ON CONFLICT (party_global_id, external_system) DO UPDATE SET external_value = EXCLUDED.external_value RETURNING *

db:select.doc:name: Get External IDs
db:select.db:sql: SELECT external_system, external_value FROM external_ids WHERE party_global_id = :globalId::uuid

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json var party = vars.party var externalIds = payload --- { id: party.id as String, globalId: party.global_id as String, partyType: party.party_type, firstName: party.first_name, lastName: party.last_name, middleName: party.middle_name, organizationName: party.organization_name, dateOfBirth: party.date_of_birth, taxId: party.tax_id, externalIds: externalIds map ((ext) -> { system: ext.external_system, value: ext.external_value }), createdAt: party.created_at, updatedAt: party.updated_at }

db:select.doc:name: Get External IDs
db:select.db:sql: SELECT external_system, external_value FROM external_ids WHERE party_global_id = :partyGlobalId::uuid

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json var party = vars.party var externalIds = payload --- { id: party.id as String, globalId: party.global_id as String, partyType: party.party_type, firstName: party.first_name, lastName: party.last_name, middleName: party.middle_name, organizationName: party.organization_name, dateOfBirth: party.date_of_birth, taxId: party.tax_id, externalIds: externalIds map ((ext) -> { system: ext.external_system, value: ext.external_value }), createdAt: party.created_at, updatedAt: party.updated_at }

db:select.doc:name: Lookup Party by External ID
db:select.db:sql: SELECT gp.* FROM global_parties gp INNER JOIN external_ids ei ON gp.global_id = ei.party_global_id WHERE ei.external_system = :externalSystem AND ei.external_value = :externalValue
